version_description:
• Animal synthesis added
• Add attendance reward
• Add user animal team information to the ranking
• Improvement of co-op mode resource acquisition method
• Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

• Animal synthesis added
• Add attendance reward
• Add user animal team information to the ranking
• Improvement of co-op mode resource acquisition method
• Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

• A new resource rainbow is added.
• Animal skins are added.
• Summon stones have been added.
• A new mythical animal unicorn is added.
• Daily missions are added.
• Three new events will be held.
• Shop and menu related UI has been improved.
• Boss and monster difficulty has been adjusted.
• Various minor bugs fixes and improvements.

• A new resource rainbow is added.
• Animal skins are added.
• Summon stones have been added.
• A new mythical animal unicorn is added.
• Daily missions are added.
• Three new events will be held.
• Shop and menu related UI has been improved.
• Boss and monster difficulty has been adjusted.
• Various minor bugs fixes and improvements.

• A new mode "Dungeon" has been added.
• Season Pass missions and rewards are added.
• New Mythic Animal Phoenix has been added.
• New Epic Animal Kangaroo has been added.
• You can get medal rewards when you win the duel mode.
• You can use the medal shop in the duel mode.
• Duel mode difficulty has been lowered.
• Co-op mode difficulty has been lowered.
• Single stage is further expanded.
• Ellie and Joy Wizard's skill effect is increased.
• Weapon effects of some animals have been increased.
• Infinite Co-op event is in progress.
• Infinite Synthesis event is in progress.

• A new mode "Dungeon" has been added.
• Season Pass missions and rewards are added.
• New Mythic Animal Phoenix has been added.
• New Epic Animal Kangaroo has been added.
• You can get medal rewards when you win the duel mode.
• You can use the medal shop in the duel mode.
• Duel mode difficulty has been lowered.
• Co-op mode difficulty has been lowered.
• Single stage is further expanded.
• Ellie and Joy Wizard's skill effect is increased.
• Weapon effects of some animals have been increased.
• Infinite Co-op event is in progress.
• Infinite Synthesis event is in progress.

- Added Gacha Ticket.
- Added Global Chat.
- The reward for watching a video changed from Gold Box to Roulette.
- Various bug fixes and game improvements.
